title: Old Dragon vs new.
body:
http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg Janna, The Storm's Fury here! Bringing you another matchup between old and new champions! Today we have a match against Shyvana, The Half-Dragon, versus Aurelion Sol, The Star Forger! As before we have Sentinels standing by in case things get out of hand between the two champions.

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg First Shyvana, what would you like to say?

{{champion:102}} I have already proven myself to dragon kind once, I will do so again.

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg And what do you have to say Aurelion?

{{champion:136}} Unfitting of the draconic lineage.

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg As before we will be testing out their kits on these minions here.

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zpsypqu9dic.png I want to speak to my lawyer!

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg Let's first start off with the champions passive abilities. Aurelion you can go first.

(Aurelion floats over and position so his stars repeatedly strike a minion.)

{{champion:136}} Boop. . .Boop. . .Boop.

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zpsypqu9dic.png Ow! Ouch! Shit this is annoying!

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg Alright Now Let's see yours Shyvana.

{{champion:102}} . . . .

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg Shyvana?

{{champion:102}} I gain bonus armor and magic resistance as I level up. . . .that's it.

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg Oh! Well okay, let's move on to the Q demonstrations! Aurelion why don't you first?

{{champion:136}} Naturally. But let's have the little lady go first shall we?

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg Okay then, Shyvana you can go first.

{{champion:102}} Hmph.

(Shyvana walks up and Qs a minion.)

{{champion:136}} That's it? You just walk up to someone and punch them twice? Oh darling let me show you a real Q!

(Aurelion Sol launches a stellar core which the minion proceeds to run away from.)

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zpsypqu9dic.png WHY IS IT GETTING BIGGER?!?

{{champion:136}} You little speck! The core continues to grow so long as I am near. . . .

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zpsypqu9dic.png **THEN STOP FOLLOWING IT!!**

{{champion:136}} Never.

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zpsypqu9dic.png AAAAAAAGH!!

(Aurelion Sol proceeds to chase the core and minion off into the distance, crossing over the horizon and out of sight.)

https://media.giphy.com/media/12KiGLydHEdak8/giphy.gif

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg OH MY!

(A little while later and Aurelion Sol comes back with the minion being dragged along by Sentinels as it didn't want to come back.)

{{champion:102}} You didn't even kill it.

{{champion:136}} I prefer to be more interesting, you can continue being a brute all you like Shyvana.

{{champion:102}} Interesting? You are one of the few champions I know that has to make something **bigger** to be interesting.

{{champion:136}} What? What do you mean? Is that a joke? I don't get it.

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg Okay let's move on to Ws! Aurelion if you would please.

{{champion:136}} Of course!

(Aurelion Sol activates his W, expanding the ring of circling stars.)

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zpsypqu9dic.png GODDAMMIT!

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg Alright now let's see yours Shyvana.

(Shyvana activates Burnout.)

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zpsypqu9dic.png Oh! Ow! Shit stop!

{{champion:136}} Almost interesting. Almost.

(Shyvana grumbles to herself.)

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg Okay now let's check out their Es!

{{champion:136}} Gaze upon my brilliance and marvel.

(Aurelion Sol builds up movement speed then takes off, flying into the distance.)

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg *sigh* this is gonna be a long day. . . .

(Later Aurelion Sol comes back.)

{{champion:102}} Took you long enough.

{{champion:136}} I'm sorry that I can fly without wings and you can't. Oh wait! You can't even fly with wings!

(Shyvana starts getting mad)

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg Alright Shyvana, your turn.

(Shyvana blasts a row of minions with her E.)

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zpsypqu9dic.png We better be getting paid after this!

{{champion:136}} Medium flame. And that is me being generous.

(Shyvana begins to show visible signs of rage.)

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg Now it's time to show their ults!

(Aurelion Sol blasts a row of minions, knocking them back.)

{{champion:136}} Let us see you top that Shyvana. That is, if you can. You terrastial dragons are but pale imitations of my kin- OOMPH!

(Aurelion Sol is cut off as Shyvana ults and slams into him. Knocking him back against a wall and snarling viciously in his face.)

{{champion:136}} Oh darling! You have but to set my hearts free.

{{champion:102}} Wait, what?

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg Well. . . .uh. . . .okay then! So let us know what you all think about this matchup, and what champions you would like to see next time in the comments below!

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg This is Janna, The Storm's Fury here, signing off!

replies.body: {{champion:82}} Children, children, you're both equally magnificent.... as my thralls! Huehuehuehuehue
Sometimes, I want to imagine that after morde gets bored of being in a band, and is done with the whole ruling runeterra, he will go live off in the mountains as a dragon tamer.
Dragon Trainer Mordekaiser Needed
I imagine him as more of a knight. perhaps a dragon knight. riot should make that, dragon knight mordekaiser.
Not sure if troll or jsut not paying attention.
or already has the skin.
Exactly, you could be trolling or just not paying attentio to the fact he has that skin.

I have the skin as well. I mean, how is it trolling or not paying attention.

It's just a prank bro.
Trolling=Prank
Trolling is a negative thing, nothing I have done is negative.
But he's not ruling anything and is canonically not part of any bands.

meant to indicate that morde is going to rule all of runeterra, and the morde band thing is based on pentakill, and let's be real, if he wanted to be in one he would be in one.

Anyway, it was just an amusing joke that fit with the tide and used good indications and such to create a vivid picture, as well as creating a setting and place for the punchline.

I don't see how the Shadow Isles would stand a chance against what it's opposed against and Mordekaiser mostly cares about killing and suffering rather than music. Pentakill is an alternate universe for a reason.

Good thing i can tame dragons. ^.^

http://orig15.deviantart.net/4bad/f/2014/318/0/9/_lol___scrap__shyvana_kisses_mordekaiser_by_su5anlee-d86fuk1.png

Sona wants a word with you.

(She's gonna write a long partition)

https://40.media.tumblr.com/0680dc908e909610f28bd527aa6a7335/tumblr_np8q8eSaax1tf13xlo2_r1_500.png

she aint too happy it appears

I am though 
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/H10zXkEmv5w/hqdefault.jpg
http://gifsec.com/wp-content/uploads/GIF/2014/10/Told-you-so-GIF.gif?gs=a

" Interesting? You are one of the few champions I know that has to make something bigger to be interesting."

Aurelion got so burned there, not just literally
Pretty good, I got a good chuckle when the minion asked for his lawyer :)
And now we have {{champion:136}} stalking {{champion:102}} and blowing galaxy sized kisses at her any time she ults...

(Aurelion Sol is cut off as Shyvana ults and slams into him. Knocking him back against a wall and snarling viciously in his face.)

http://www.forexfactory.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=1737803&stc=1&d=1440170121
That would be Shield Vs door.
but braum calls his door a shield all the time
Nevertheless it is a door. An indestructible one, but a door nonetheless.
{{champion:420}} VS{{champion:122}} unless that has already happened I don't know
I've only done Ashe vs Jhin and Shyvana vs Aurelion Sol so far so I might do this.
Ironically, Shyvana can eat Aurelion for breakfast in a real game.
DRAGONS!
{{champion:17}}: (Takes notes.) Maybe something they do will be a good gift for Tristana and her dragon...
